00023 ** Definition of the Constructor and Destructor

00025 clVolumeGridFrame::clVolumeGridFrame(wxAuiNotebook *parent, const wxString& title, const wxPoint& pos, const wxSize& size, const long style, clUnstructured3D *volGrid):
00026                             wxPanel(parent, wxID_ANY, pos, size, style, title)
00027 {
00028   canvas               = NULL;
00029   volumeGrid           = volGrid;
00030   parentFrame          = parent;
00031   highLightObjectType  = hlNone;
00032   SetUpCanvas();
00033 }

00044 /*
00045 ** Methods for drawing
00046 */
00047 void clVolumeGridFrame::BuildVertexArray(tpArray<GLfloat> *vertexArray, tpArray<int> *highLightArray) const
00048 {
00049   try
00050   {
00051     int numVertices = 0;
00052 
00053     // For each tetrahedron in the volumeGrid
00054     for(int theElementIndex=0; theElementIndex<volumeGrid->GetNumberElements(); theElementIndex++)
00055     {
00056       clTetrahedron *theElement = volumeGrid->GetElementPointer(theElementIndex);
00057       if(!theElement->IsHalo())
00058       {
00059         // For each face in the element
00060         for(int theFaceIndex=0; theFaceIndex<theElement->GetNumberFaces(); theFaceIndex++)
00061         {
00062           // Get the indices of the nodes
00063           int theFaceNodes[theElement->GetNumberFaceNodes()];
00064           theElement->GetFaceNodes(theFaceIndex, theFaceNodes);
00065 
00066           // For each node in the face
00067           for(int theFaceNodeIndex=0; theFaceNodeIndex<theElement->GetNumberFaceNodes(); theFaceNodeIndex++)
00068           {
00069             int       theNodeEntry = theFaceNodes[theFaceNodeIndex];
00070             int       theNodeID    = theElement->GetNodeID(theNodeEntry);
00071             int       theNodeIndex = volumeGrid->GetNodeIndex(theNodeID);
00072             clNode3D *theNode      = volumeGrid->GetNodePointer(theNodeIndex);
00073 
00074             // Retrieve the node from the volumeGrid
00075             vertexArray->AddItem(theNode->x());
00076             vertexArray->AddItem(theNode->y());
00077             vertexArray->AddItem(theNode->z());
00078 
00079             // Set highlighting
00080             switch(highLightObjectType)
00081             {
00082               case hlElement:
00083                 if(theElementIndex == highLightObjects[0])
00084                   highLightArray->AddItem(numVertices);
00085                 break;
00086 
00087               case hlFace:
00088                 if((theElementIndex == highLightObjects[0]) && (theFaceIndex == highLightObjects[1]))
00089                   highLightArray->AddItem(numVertices);
00090                 break;
00091 
00092               case hlNode:
00093                 //TODO: Add hlNode action
00094                 break;
00095 
00096               case hlNone:
00097                 //TODO: Add hlNone action
00098                 break;
00099             }
00100 
00101             numVertices++;
00102           }
00103         }
00104       }
00105     }
00106   }
00107 
00108   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00109   {
00110     EX.AddMethodToTree("clUnstructured3D::BuildVertexArray");
00111     throw(EX);
00112   }
00113 }
00114 
00115 void clVolumeGridFrame::SetUpCanvas(void)
00116 {
00117   try
00118   {
00119     GLfloat xMin = (GLfloat)(-20);
00120     GLfloat xMax = (GLfloat)(20);
00121     GLfloat yMin = (GLfloat)(-20);
00122     GLfloat yMax = (GLfloat)(20);
00123     GLfloat zMin = (GLfloat)(-20);
00124     GLfloat zMax = (GLfloat)(20);
00125 
00126     tpArray<GLfloat> *vertexArray    = new tpArray<GLfloat>;
00127     tpArray<int>     *highLightArray = new tpArray<int>;
00128     BuildVertexArray(vertexArray, highLightArray);
00129 
00130     /*
00131     ** Initialise the canvas
00132     */
00133     wxBoxSizer* sizer;
00134     sizer = new wxBoxSizer( wxHORIZONTAL );
00135 
00136     canvas = new clCanvas(this, wxID_ANY, wxDefaultPosition, wxDefaultSize, wxDEFAULT_FRAME_STYLE, "clCanvas", dsWireFrame, GL_TRIANGLES);
00137     sizer->Add( canvas, 1, wxEXPAND | wxALL, 5 );
00138     SetSizer(sizer);
00139 
00140     canvas->SetMaxima(xMin, xMax, yMin, yMax, zMin, zMax);
00141     canvas->SetRotations(-30.0f, 30.0f, 0.0f);
00142     canvas->SetTranslations( -0.5*(xMin+xMax), -0.5*(yMin+yMax), -0.5*(zMin+zMax));
00143     canvas->SetScaleFactor(1.0f);
00144     canvas->SetVertices(vertexArray, highLightArray);
00145 
00146     Show();
00147   }
00148 
00149   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00150   {
00151     EX.AddMethodToTree("clVolumeGridFrame::SetUpCanvas");
00152     throw(EX);
00153   }
00154 }
00155 
00156 void clVolumeGridFrame::RedrawCanvas(void)
00157 {
00158   try
00159   {
00160     tpArray<GLfloat> *vertexArray    = new tpArray<GLfloat>;
00161     tpArray<int>     *highLightArray = new tpArray<int>;
00162     BuildVertexArray(vertexArray, highLightArray);
00163 
00164     canvas->SetVertices(vertexArray, highLightArray);
00165     canvas->Refresh();
00166   }
00167 
00168   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00169   {
00170     EX.AddMethodToTree("clVolumeGridFrame::RedrawCanvas");
00171     throw(EX);
00172   }
00173 }

00198 void clVolumeGridFrame::OnActivate(wxActivateEvent& event)
00199 {
00200   if (event.GetActive() && canvas)
